title: Hi, I’m Ryan Hernandez
text:
(images/RyanHeadshot.jpeg)



I’m a HR professional currently working as a HR Business Partner for Amazon Sort Centers. I specialize in employee engagement and retention as well as the growth and development of our management team.

title: Hi, I’m Ryan Hernandez
text:
About Me
I hold a Bachelors of Science in Business Administration with a focus on Management and Human Resources as well as Masters Degree in Business Administration (in Progress) from California State Polytechnic University, Pomona. I also hold a SHRM-CP certification from the Society for Human Resources Management.

title: Hi, I’m Ryan Hernandez
